MediaStreamTrackUnmute_event.summary: The unmute event is sent to a when the track's source is once again able to provide media data after a period of not being able to do so.

remarks.para: This ends the state that began with the event.

blockquote.para: Note: The condition that most people think of as "muted" (that is, a user-controllable way to silence a track) is actually managed using the property, for which there are no events.

remarks.para: This event is not cancelable and does not bubble.
